Monicora

Class ServerConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • Monicora.ServerConnection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class ServerConnection
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    A ServerConnection represent a link between the server and the connected device using MonicOra. A connection is secured using RSA and exchanging a symetric key. The private key is needed, and retrieved using the path given in the config file (default = the same as the MonicaRes). It is possible to send file or text to a user through this class.

      Send an image represented by it's absoulte path to this connection. .png format are functional on ORA devices.

      Send a message to the ORA device associated with this connection.
      void sendVideo(java.lang.String path)
      Send a video represented by the absoulte path given to this connection. .mp4 using H264 are functional on ORA devices.
